meta.name: Ireland's Fittest Family
meta.description: Laura Fox is the latest presenter of the exacting reality show, in which families vie to prove they are the fittest in Ireland. They are mentored by Nina Carberry, Donncha O'Callaghan, Davy Fitzgerald and, for the first time ever, Cobh track and field icon Sonia O'Sullivan.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Over two semi-final heats in a feature-length episode from Drogheda Port, the six remaining families will become four as they battle it out for a place in the Grand Final.
